description: This source file implements HTTP method handling functions for a web servlet object within the Broadway Web Service Plane (BWSP). It defines functions for processing various HTTP methods such as OPTIONS, GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, DELETE, TRACE, and CONNECT. Each method handler either delegates to an external interface if available or generates an appropriate default response, such as 'Method Not Allowed' with an Allow header when specific handlers are not implemented.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoOptions(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Handles HTTP OPTIONS method by delegating to an external interface or replying with default OK.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoGet(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET method by delegating to an external interface or replying with default OK.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoHead(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Handles HTTP HEAD method similarly, delegating or replying with OK.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoPost(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST. Delegates if possible; otherwise, responds with '405 Method Not Allowed' and an Allow header with supported methods.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoPut(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Handles HTTP PUT with delegation or default '405 Method Not Allowed'.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoDelete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE similarly, with delegation or default response.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoTrace(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Handles HTTP TRACE, delegating or returning '405 Method Not Allowed'.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwspWsoDoConnect(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Handles HTTP CONNECT, delegating or returning '405 Method Not Allowed'.
